description: Try our easy to follow Beans With Shaved Brussels Sprouts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Saut√©ed vegetable,Pescatarian,Brussels sprout,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Green beans,Sesame free,Halal,Christmas,Wheat free,Vegetarian
name: Beans With Shaved Brussels Sprouts Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Blanch beans in boiling water for 2-3 minutes until bright green and just tender.
Refresh in cold water. Shave or thinly slice Brussels sprouts.

Melt butter in a large, deep frying pan. Add beans and sprouts and toss over heat for 3 minutes or until just golden and warmed through. Add lemon juice and season with salt and pepper. Transfer to a serving bowl. Top with onion and pine nuts to serve.
